mean_cn: n.通货膨胀；（充气后）膨胀；自负
mean_en: a general rise in the prices of services and goods in a particular country, resulting in a fall in the value of money; the rate at which this happens
sentence: Because of the inflation, we could buy less fruit with the same money.
sentence_trans: 因为通货膨胀，我们用同样的钱只能买到更少的水果。
word_etyma: in进 + flat吹 + ion表名词 → 充气；通货膨胀
